thread.title: Retail inflation at 8-month high, dampens rate cut hopes
thread.title_full: Retail inflation at 8-month high, dampens rate cut hopes

title: Retail inflation at 8-month high, dampens rate cut hopes
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 13, 2015, 14:25 BST - UK Markets close in 2 hrs 5 mins Retail inflation nudges up to 5.40 pct in June Reuters – 1 hour 15 minutes ago View Photo 
Pulses are kept on display for sale in a shop at a market in Ahmedabad, June 20, 2015. REUTERS/Amit … 
NEW DELHI (Reuters) - India's consumer price inflation edged up to 5.40 percent in June, government data showed on Monday. 
The data compared with a 5.10 percent annual rise predicted by analysts in a Reuters poll and 5.01 percent print in May. 
Retail food inflation rose to 5.48 percent last month from 4.80 percent in May. 
(Reporting by Aditya Kalra; Editing by Malini Menon) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
